Posts.Content: pennymominnie wrote: I was just diagnosed with breast cancer on September 8, 09.  This week, I have had a bone scan and CT scans on my chest, pelvis and abdomin.  I meet with the oncologist on Wednesday and then with the surgeon on the following Monday.  I do not know too much about my condition until I meet with the oncologist on Wednesday.  I was just wondering if anyone can share some advice on how to tell an 8-year old little boy that his (favorite) step-mom has cancer.  How do you explain cancer to somebody that is so young? Nancy Dx 9/8/2009, 2cm Log in to post a reply
